area.key: Beta software This is an early beta release of uSync.Migrations. Things may not function as expected, code may change, etc.
You don't need to Migrate uSync v8 files to uSync v9/10+ - simply copy or rename the uSync/v8 folder to uSync/v9
You can customize this list with your own `ISyncMigrationProfile` or remove and add simple configs with a '/usync/profiles.json' file.
